description: This file contains CSS styles for the frontend of a Tic Tac Toe application, including theme management for light and dark modes, styling for the app's header, logo, and toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and applies theme colors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styles layout and appearance.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button to toggle between light and dark themes, includes hover and active effects.
